column3: Increases our reliance on being compiled with assert() for correct behavior in some abstract sense. I'm not sure if I care given that it will not fail.\n
utACK - we're already relying on assert, and test for it. If we ever want to get rid of it, it's obvious where in code changes are needed.\n
Right - we need to replace asserts with a macro that calls to a custom function that cannot be compiled out at some point.\n
